entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Taloyoak
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:11 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southwest 20 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 34 by morning. Wind chill minus 57 this evening and minus 48 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:08 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High minus 33. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming northwest 20 near noon. High minus 33. Wind chill near minus 49. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:08 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 37. Wind chill near minus 50. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:08 PM MST Wednesday 01 February 2023
